description:Weapons roundup as at S15 Festival of the Lost - additional personal rolls

// Gridskipper (PvE first choice roll)
// Recommended barrels not mentioned in Podcast 213 (Extended Barrel, Hammer-forged Rifling, Smallbore, Corkscrew Rifling), Combat Mags (High-Calibre Rounds, Armor-Piercing Rounds), Heating up, Recommended Trait 2 from Podcast 213 (Thresh, Frenzy, Adrenaline Junkie)
